name: Bitter Brews
description:
Hi! I'm Mokka and I'm an artist, and this is the first game jam I have entered where I have done the code for a game completely by myself (after learning C# non-stop for about two months). I'm really proud of this project, but it's still currently a prototype as it took me a long time to code things and I still drew all the art from scratch as well (which means unfortunately there are things missing).
However, I really love what I've made and will continue to update it once the jam is over. There's so much more I wanted to add! :D

Please let me know what you think of it so far, as I would really appreciate any feedback. Thanks!

BITTER BREWS

Far away in a distant land an evil witch cast a spell and an eternal winter befell the world. Tucked away into a pocket of a mountain is a cosy cafe that serves warm potions to those in need. Will the world ever escape this bitter curse?

  • Make up to 10 different brews for a variety of fantasy customers
  • Mix and match 12 different ingredients in your cauldron by dragging ingredients
  • Customers full of character!

COMING SOON:

  • More customers (at least 10 total)
  • A record of all brews you have made, along with the recipes to make them
  • A proper intro to the game with LORE™ and a proper title screen
  • A boss encounter with the winter witch
  • Customer expression changes
  • Customer shenanigans
